# subtitle

**Instance Property**

The subtitle to display alongside the menu element’s title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Only the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/context] menu system supports the display of a subtitle, and only when the app is running on iOS.

## Getting the element attributes

- **title**: The title of the menu element.
- **image**: The image to display alongside the menu element’s title.

items.description: The title of the menu element.
items.name: title

items.description: The image to display alongside the menu element’s title.
items.name: image

title: subtitle
